title: Premium Masks
description: TruSafe line of premium Bacterial Filtration Efficency single use masks continues to meet the need of consumers with options for virtually any work or everyday activity. These masks were made to exceed the current NIOSH certication requirements. They are classified as Pre-NIOSH certified, allowing them to be provided to non-medical customers.
notes: Premium 50g outer layer black masks with BFE rating of over 99% and high breathability. USA95 masks made for general public use to the same specifications as our NIOSH certified N95
These are rated for general public knowledge and are designated as ASTM 3501 level 1 and level 2. NIOSH Certified N95 FDA Certified Surgical F2100 Level 3 Blue Masks
htmldata:
Filtering out the confusion on Masks, pardon the pun. Surgical, Niosh, N95, what does it all mean and how can I trust the mask I buy?

First some background. The medical market was thrown a curve ball in the early stages of that pandemic because of several reasons. The first is painful to even write but it was because of greed. Everyone wanted to buy cheap so even if it was an American companies shifted their manufacturing overseas. When the pandemic hit those countries as well, they did not have enough for their own country and the world stopped shipping outside their own borders. The second reason is that the virus transmission required everyone to wear masks not just those in surgery putting the demand for supplies beyond even the generous stockpiles. The third reason was survival and greed. Once the General Population started to purchase masks, the price was inflated to meet the demand but also opened the door for inferior products with little to no testing.

  • General Public Masks are rated on two key factors. Breathability and BFE Bacterial Filtration Efficiency.
  • ASTM 3502 Level one only provides about 20% BFE and is rated below a 14 on Breathability.y
  • ASTM 3502 Level 2 provides 50% BFE and is rated below a 5 on Breathability

title: Hand Sanitizer
description: Designed by a former food and beverage executive to provide a clean fragrance free solution when soap and water is not available. Pharmaceutical grade alcohol made from Midwest Corn. Each batch tested to ensure potency and safety.
notes: TruSafe line of hand sanitizers is the perfect solution to help you fight germs when soap and water are not readily available.
TruSafe is a topical antiseptic that kills 99.9% of the most common illness-causing germs.
But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure praising pain was born and I will give you complete account of the system expound
htmldata:
Hand Sanitizer Gel

TruSafe line of hand sanitizers is the perfect solution to help you get germs when soap and water are not readily available. TruSafe is a topical antiseptic that kills 99.9% of the most common illness-causing germs.

  • Manufactured, bottled and quality tested in USA
  • Certified analysis to meet FDA monograph
  • Contains proven efficacious levels of 70% active ingredient
  • Contains Aloe Vera plus anti-inflammatory skin conditioners to help repair dry skin

title: Air Guardian
description: The Immaculight and AirGuardian units are proven effective in Sanitizing surfaces and most importantly the AIR. The research on these are extensive and worth reviewing if you are serious about reopening and remaining operational now and in the future. Please click here to go to the scientific data that supports all our claims. One key Attribute is that Air Guardian is NOT I repeat NOT an air filter. Air filters trap particles after a certain number of passes through the filter. Air Guardian KILLS these germ virus particles with one pass through the chamber.
